short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts full names into one letter (google documents)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever had that problem in google documents, where you couldn't see what you were writing because people's names were too long?

Me too, so that's why I made Short Names. It's easy to use and one-click to install, so there's no need to set it up.

What can Short Names do?
    - The only feature Short Names have is taking the first letter in people's usernames and making that their cursor-username.

It's super simple and fixes an irritating problem when writing multiple in a document.
